description: TETR.IO gamers may use TETR.IO PLUS to modify its gameplay. For example, a gamer may load a TPSE file to mimic the gameplay of Nintendo DS Tetris.
Gamers may create custom settings and export them as TPSE files to share them with other TETR.IO gamers. They may also download them and import them into TETR.IO.
